titleStmt.title: A Quakers sea-journal being a true relation of a voyage to New-England / performed by Robert Fowler of the town of Burlington in Yorkshire, in the year 1658.
titleStmt.author: Fowler, Robert, of the town of Burlington in Yorkshire.

notesStmt.note: An account of a Quaker's voyage from London to New Amsterdam in a small vessel called the Woodhouse.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
